column1:
luck /lək/
noun - it was just luck that the first kick went in
luck was with me - I don't like Friday—it's bad luck
,"Part of Speech: noun

column2: 1. success or failure apparently brought by chance rather than through one's own actions.
2. chance considered as a force that causes good or bad things to happen.
3. something regarded as bringing about or portending good or bad things.

column1:
sanitize /ˈsanəˌtīz/
verb - new chemicals for sanitizing a pool
,"Part of Speech: verb
